107// BLAS helper functions to select the correct function based on type
108template<typename T>
109inline T blas_dot(const int N, const T *X, const int incX, const T *Y, const int incY) {
110 // Fallback for unsupported types
111 T result = T();
112 for (int i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
113 result += X[i * incX] * Y[i * incY];
114 }
115 return result;
116}
117
118template<>
119inline float blas_dot<float>(const int N, const float *X, const int incX, const float *Y, const int incY) {
120 return cblas_sdot(N, X, incX, Y, incY);
121}
122
123template<>
124inline double blas_dot<double>(const int N, const double *X, const int incX, const double *Y, const int incY) {
125 return cblas_ddot(N, X, incX, Y, incY);
126}
127
128template<typename T>
129inline void blas_scal(const int N, const T alpha, T *X, const int incX) {
130 // Fallback for unsupported types
131 for (int i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
132 X[i * incX] *= alpha;
133 }
134}
135
136template<>
137inline void blas_scal<float>(const int N, const float alpha, float *X, const int incX) {
138 cblas_sscal(N, alpha, X, incX);
139}
140
141template<>
142inline void blas_scal<double>(const int N, const double alpha, double *X, const int incX) {
143 cblas_dscal(N, alpha, X, incX);
144}
145
146template<typename T>
147inline void blas_gemm(const int Order, const int TransA, const int TransB,
148 const int M, const int N, const int K,
149 const T alpha, const T *A, const int lda,
150 const T *B, const int ldb,
151 const T beta, T *C, const int ldc) {
152 // Fallback for unsupported types - standard matrix multiplication
153 for (int i = 0; i < M; ++i) {
154 for (int j = 0; j < N; ++j) {
155 T sum = T();
156 for (int k = 0; k < K; ++k) {
157 sum += A[i * lda + k] * B[k * ldb + j];
158 }
159 C[i * ldc + j] = beta * C[i * ldc + j] + alpha * sum;
160 }
161 }
162}
163
164template<>
165inline void blas_gemm<float>(const int Order, const int TransA, const int TransB,
166 const int M, const int N, const int K,
167 const float alpha, const float *A, const int lda,
168 const float *B, const int ldb,
169 const float beta, float *C, const int ldc) {
170 cblas_sgemm(Order, TransA, TransB, M, N, K, alpha, A, lda, B, ldb, beta, C, ldc);
171}
172
173template<>
174inline void blas_gemm<double>(const int Order, const int TransA, const int TransB,
175 const int M, const int N, const int K,
176 const double alpha, const double *A, const int lda,
177 const double *B, const int ldb,
178 const double beta, double *C, const int ldc) {
179 cblas_dgemm(Order, TransA, TransB, M, N, K, alpha, A, lda, B, ldb, beta, C, ldc);
180}

190enum class Backend {
191 CPU,
192 BLAS,
193 GPU
194};
195
201inline std::string backend_name(Backend backend) {
202 switch (backend) {
203 case Backend::CPU: return "CPU";
204 case Backend::BLAS: return "BLAS";
205 case Backend::GPU: return "GPU";
206 default: return "Unknown";
207 }
208}
209
217inline Backend get_active_backend() {
218#ifdef USE_GPU
219 if (TensorGPU::is_gpu_available()) {
220 return Backend::GPU;
221 }
222#endif
223#ifdef USE_BLAS
224 return Backend::BLAS;
225#endif
226 return Backend::CPU;
227}

260enum class TensorError {
261 DimensionMismatch,
262 ContractionMismatch,
263 InvalidArgument,
264 SingularMatrix,
265 NotPositiveDefinite,
266 NotSquare,
267 EmptyMatrix,
268 LapackError,
269 NotImplemented
270};
271
277inline std::string to_string(TensorError error) {
278 switch (error) {
279 case TensorError::DimensionMismatch:
280 return "Tensor dimensions must match";
281 case TensorError::ContractionMismatch:
282 return "Contraction dimension must match";
283 case TensorError::InvalidArgument:
284 return "Invalid argument provided";
285 case TensorError::SingularMatrix:
286 return "Matrix is singular (non-invertible)";
287 case TensorError::NotPositiveDefinite:
288 return "Matrix is not positive definite";
289 case TensorError::NotSquare:
290 return "Operation requires square matrix";
291 case TensorError::EmptyMatrix:
292 return "Matrix is empty";
293 case TensorError::LapackError:
294 return "LAPACK routine error";
295 case TensorError::NotImplemented:
296 return "Feature not yet implemented";
297 default:
298 return "Unknown error";
299 }
300}

468template <typename T, size_t N>
469class Tensor {
470private:
471 std::unique_ptr<T[]> data_;
472 TensorIndices<N> dims_;
473 TensorIndices<N> strides_;
474 bool use_gpu_;
475
478 bool requires_grad_;
479 std::unique_ptr<Tensor<T, N>> grad_;
480 std::vector<BackwardFunc<T, N>> backward_funcs_;
481 bool is_leaf_;
483
489 size_t offset(const TensorIndices<N>& indices) const {
490 size_t off = 0;
491 for (size_t i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
492 off += indices[i] * strides_[i];
493 }
494 return off;
495 }
496
497 // Friend declaration to allow tensors of different dimensions to access each other's data
498 template <typename U, size_t M>
499 friend class Tensor;
500
501 // Friend declarations for TensorView and TensorSlice
502 template <typename U, size_t M>
503 friend class TensorView;
504 template <typename U, size_t M>
505 friend class TensorSlice;
506
507 // Friend declarations for I/O functions
508 template <typename U, size_t M>
509 friend bool save_binary(const Tensor<U, M>&, const std::string&);
510 template <typename U, size_t M>
511 friend bool save_text(const Tensor<U, M>&, const std::string&, int);
512 template <typename U, size_t M>
513 friend bool save_npy(const Tensor<U, M>&, const std::string&);
514 template <typename U, size_t M>
515 friend void print(const Tensor<U, M>&, std::ostream&, int, size_t, size_t);
516
517 // Friend declarations for scalar-first operators
518 template <typename U, size_t M>
519 friend Tensor<U, M> operator+(const U& scalar, const Tensor<U, M>& tensor);
520 template <typename U, size_t M>
521 friend Tensor<U, M> operator-(const U& scalar, const Tensor<U, M>& tensor);
522 template <typename U, size_t M>
523 friend Tensor<U, M> operator*(const U& scalar, const Tensor<U, M>& tensor);
524 template <typename U, size_t M>
525 friend Tensor<U, M> operator/(const U& scalar, const Tensor<U, M>& tensor);
526
527public:
528 // Public data accessors for use by library functions
529 const T* data_ptr() const { return data_.get(); }
530 T* data_ptr() { return data_.get(); }
531
536 size_t total_size() const {
537 size_t size = 1;
538 for (size_t i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
539 size *= dims_[i];
540 }
541 return size;
542 }
543
548 const T* data() const { return data_.get(); }
549 T* data() { return data_.get(); }
550
555 const TensorIndices<N>& strides() const { return strides_; }
556
557public:
558
565 Tensor(const TensorIndices<N>& dimensions, bool use_gpu = true, bool requires_grad = false)
566 : dims_(dimensions), requires_grad_(requires_grad), is_leaf_(true) {
567 size_t total = 1;
568 for (size_t i = N; i-- > 0;) {
569 strides_[i] = total;
570 total *= dims_[i];
571 }
572 data_ = std::make_unique<T[]>(total);
573#ifdef USE_GPU
574 use_gpu_ = use_gpu && TensorGPU::is_gpu_available();
575#else
576 use_gpu_ = false;
577#endif
578 if (requires_grad_) {
579 grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(dims_, use_gpu_, false);
580 grad_->fill(T(0));
581 }
582 }
583
588 Tensor(const Tensor& other)
589 : dims_(other.dims_), strides_(other.strides_), use_gpu_(other.use_gpu_),
590 requires_grad_(other.requires_grad_), is_leaf_(other.is_leaf_),
591 backward_funcs_(other.backward_funcs_) {
592 size_t total = total_size();
593 data_ = std::make_unique<T[]>(total);
594 std::copy(other.data_.get(), other.data_.get() + total, data_.get());
595
596 // Copy gradient if it exists
597 if (other.grad_) {
598 grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(*other.grad_);
599 }
600 }
601
607 Tensor& operator=(const Tensor& other) {
608 if (this != &other) {
609 dims_ = other.dims_;
610 strides_ = other.strides_;
611 use_gpu_ = other.use_gpu_;
612 requires_grad_ = other.requires_grad_;
613 is_leaf_ = other.is_leaf_;
614 backward_funcs_ = other.backward_funcs_;
615
616 size_t total = total_size();
617 data_ = std::make_unique<T[]>(total);
618 std::copy(other.data_.get(), other.data_.get() + total, data_.get());
619
620 // Copy gradient if it exists
621 if (other.grad_) {
622 grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(*other.grad_);
623 } else {
624 grad_.reset();
625 }
626 }
627 return *this;
628 }
629
635 T& operator[](const TensorIndices<N>& indices) {
636 return data_[offset(indices)];
637 }
638
644 const T& operator[](const TensorIndices<N>& indices) const {
645 return data_[offset(indices)];
646 }
647
661 void fill(const T& value) {
662 std::fill(data_.get(), data_.get() + total_size(), value);
663 }
664
669 TensorIndices<N> dims() const { return dims_; }
670
675 TensorIndices<N> shape() const { return dims_; }
676
681 bool uses_gpu() const { return use_gpu_; }
682
693 Backend backend() const {
694 if (use_gpu_) {
695 return Backend::GPU;
696 }
697#ifdef USE_BLAS
698 return Backend::BLAS;
699#else
700 return Backend::CPU;
701#endif
702 }

734 // Autograd Methods
735 // ============================================
736
741 void set_requires_grad(bool requires_grad) {
742 requires_grad_ = requires_grad;
743 if (requires_grad_ && !grad_) {
744 grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(dims_, use_gpu_, false);
745 grad_->fill(T(0));
746 }
747 }
748
753 bool requires_grad() const { return requires_grad_; }
754
759 bool is_leaf() const { return is_leaf_; }
760
765 Tensor<T, N>* grad() { return grad_.get(); }
766 const Tensor<T, N>* grad() const { return grad_.get(); }
767
771 void zero_grad() {
772 if (grad_) {
773 grad_->fill(T(0));
774 }
775 backward_funcs_.clear();
776 }
777
808 std::optional<TensorError> backward(const Tensor<T, N>* gradient = nullptr) {
809 if (!requires_grad_) {
810 return TensorError::InvalidArgument;
811 }
812
813 // If this is not a scalar and no gradient provided, error
814 if (!gradient && total_size() != 1) {
815 return TensorError::InvalidArgument;
816 }
817
818 // Initialize gradient
819 if (!grad_) {
820 grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(dims_, use_gpu_, false);
821 grad_->fill(T(0));
822 }
823
824 if (gradient) {
825 // Accumulate provided gradient
826 size_t total = total_size();
827 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
828 grad_->data_[i] += gradient->data_[i];
829 }
830 } else {
831 // For scalar, start with gradient of 1
832 grad_->data_[0] = T(1);
833 }
834
835 // Call all backward functions to propagate gradients
836 for (auto& func : backward_funcs_) {
837 func(*grad_);
838 }
839
840 return std::nullopt;
841 }
842
847 Tensor<T, N> detach() const {
848 Tensor<T, N> result(dims_, use_gpu_, false);
849 size_t total = total_size();
850 std::copy(data_.get(), data_.get() + total, result.data_.get());
851 return result;
852 }
853
858 void register_backward(BackwardFunc<T, N> func) {
859 backward_funcs_.push_back(func);
860 }
861
892 TensorResult<Tensor<T, N>> operator+(const Tensor<T, N>& other) const {
893 // Check if shapes match exactly
894 if (dims_ == other.dims_) {
895 // Fast path: exact shape match
896 bool track_grad = requires_grad_ || other.requires_grad_;
897 Tensor<T, N> result(dims_, use_gpu_, track_grad);
898 result.is_leaf_ = false;
899 size_t total = total_size();
900
901#ifdef USE_GPU
902 if (use_gpu_ && other.use_gpu_) {
903 TensorGPU::add_gpu(data_.get(), other.data_.get(), result.data_.get(), total);
904 } else
905#endif
906 {
907 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
908 result.data_[i] = data_[i] + other.data_[i];
909 }
910 }
911
912 // Setup backward pass (existing code continues below)
913 if (track_grad) {
914 Tensor<T, N>* self_ptr = const_cast<Tensor<T, N>*>(this);
915 Tensor<T, N>* other_ptr = const_cast<Tensor<T, N>*>(&other);
916
917 result.register_backward([self_ptr, other_ptr](const Tensor<T, N>& grad) {
918 if (self_ptr->requires_grad_) {
919 if (!self_ptr->grad_) {
920 self_ptr->grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(self_ptr->dims_, self_ptr->use_gpu_, false);
921 self_ptr->grad_->fill(T(0));
922 }
923 size_t total = self_ptr->total_size();
924 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
925 self_ptr->grad_->data_[i] += grad.data_[i];
926 }
927
928 if (!self_ptr->is_leaf_ && !self_ptr->backward_funcs_.empty()) {
929 for (auto& func : self_ptr->backward_funcs_) {
930 func(*self_ptr->grad_);
931 }
932 }
933 }
934
935 if (other_ptr->requires_grad_) {
936 if (!other_ptr->grad_) {
937 other_ptr->grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(other_ptr->dims_, other_ptr->use_gpu_, false);
938 other_ptr->grad_->fill(T(0));
939 }
940 size_t total = other_ptr->total_size();
941 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
942 other_ptr->grad_->data_[i] += grad.data_[i];
943 }
944
945 if (!other_ptr->is_leaf_ && !other_ptr->backward_funcs_.empty()) {
946 for (auto& func : other_ptr->backward_funcs_) {
947 func(*other_ptr->grad_);
948 }
949 }
950 }
951 });
952 }
953
954 return result;
955 }
956
957 // Try broadcasting
958 std::string error_msg;
959 if (!are_broadcastable(dims_, other.dims_, &error_msg)) {
960 return TensorError::DimensionMismatch;
961 }
962
963 // Determine broadcast shape
964 TensorIndices<N> broadcast_shape = dims_;
965 for (size_t i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
966 broadcast_shape[i] = std::max(dims_[i], other.dims_[i]);
967 }
968
969 // Create result with broadcast shape
970 bool track_grad = requires_grad_ || other.requires_grad_;
971 Tensor<T, N> result(broadcast_shape, use_gpu_, track_grad);
972 result.is_leaf_ = false;
973
974 // Perform broadcasted addition
975 size_t total = result.total_size();
976 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
977 TensorIndices<N> coords;
978 size_t idx = i;
979 for (size_t d = N; d > 0; --d) {
980 coords[d - 1] = idx % broadcast_shape[d - 1];
981 idx /= broadcast_shape[d - 1];
982 }
983
984 // Map to source indices
985 size_t self_idx = 0, other_idx = 0;
986 size_t self_stride = 1, other_stride = 1;
987 for (size_t d = N; d > 0; --d) {
988 size_t dim = d - 1;
989 size_t self_coord = (dims_[dim] == 1) ? 0 : coords[dim];
990 size_t other_coord = (other.dims_[dim] == 1) ? 0 : coords[dim];
991
992 if (dim + 1 < N) {
993 self_stride *= dims_[dim + 1];
994 other_stride *= other.dims_[dim + 1];
995 }
996
997 self_idx += self_coord * self_stride;
998 other_idx += other_coord * other_stride;
999 }
1000
1001 result.data_[i] = data_[self_idx] + other.data_[other_idx];
1002 }
1003
1004 // Setup backward pass
1005 if (track_grad) {
1006 // Capture pointers to input tensors
1007 Tensor<T, N>* self_ptr = const_cast<Tensor<T, N>*>(this);
1008 Tensor<T, N>* other_ptr = const_cast<Tensor<T, N>*>(&other);
1009
1010 result.register_backward([self_ptr, other_ptr](const Tensor<T, N>& grad) {
1011 // Gradient of addition: d/dx(x+y) = 1, d/dy(x+y) = 1
1012 if (self_ptr->requires_grad_) {
1013 if (!self_ptr->grad_) {
1014 self_ptr->grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(self_ptr->dims_, self_ptr->use_gpu_, false);
1015 self_ptr->grad_->fill(T(0));
1016 }
1017 size_t total = self_ptr->total_size();
1018 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
1019 self_ptr->grad_->data_[i] += grad.data_[i];
1020 }
1021
1022 // If self is not a leaf, propagate gradients further
1023 if (!self_ptr->is_leaf_ && !self_ptr->backward_funcs_.empty()) {
1024 for (auto& func : self_ptr->backward_funcs_) {
1025 func(*self_ptr->grad_);
1026 }
1027 }
1028 }
1029
1030 if (other_ptr->requires_grad_) {
1031 if (!other_ptr->grad_) {
1032 other_ptr->grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(other_ptr->dims_, other_ptr->use_gpu_, false);
1033 other_ptr->grad_->fill(T(0));
1034 }
1035 size_t total = other_ptr->total_size();
1036 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
1037 other_ptr->grad_->data_[i] += grad.data_[i];
1038 }
1039
1040 // If other is not a leaf, propagate gradients further
1041 if (!other_ptr->is_leaf_ && !other_ptr->backward_funcs_.empty()) {
1042 for (auto& func : other_ptr->backward_funcs_) {
1043 func(*other_ptr->grad_);
1044 }
1045 }
1046 }
1047 });
1048 }
1049
1050 return result;
1051 }
1052
1059 Tensor<T, N> operator+(const T& scalar) const {
1060 Tensor<T, N> result(dims_, use_gpu_, requires_grad_);
1061 result.is_leaf_ = false;
1062 size_t total = total_size();
1063
1064#ifdef USE_GPU
1065 if (use_gpu_) {
1066 TensorGPU::add_scalar_gpu(data_.get(), scalar, result.data_.get(), total);
1067 } else
1068#endif
1069 {
1070 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
1071 result.data_[i] = data_[i] + scalar;
1072 }
1073 }
1074
1075 // Setup backward pass
1076 if (requires_grad_) {
1077 Tensor<T, N>* self_ptr = const_cast<Tensor<T, N>*>(this);
1078
1079 result.register_backward([self_ptr](const Tensor<T, N>& grad) {
1080 // Gradient of addition with scalar: d/dx(x+c) = 1
1081 if (self_ptr->requires_grad_) {
1082 if (!self_ptr->grad_) {
1083 self_ptr->grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(self_ptr->dims_, self_ptr->use_gpu_, false);
1084 self_ptr->grad_->fill(T(0));
1085 }
1086 size_t total = self_ptr->total_size();
1087 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
1088 self_ptr->grad_->data_[i] += grad.data_[i];
1089 }
1090
1091 // If self is not a leaf, propagate gradients further
1092 if (!self_ptr->is_leaf_ && !self_ptr->backward_funcs_.empty()) {
1093 for (auto& func : self_ptr->backward_funcs_) {
1094 func(*self_ptr->grad_);
1095 }
1096 }
1097 }
1098 });
1099 }
1100
1101 return result;
1102 }

1116#ifdef USE_GPU

1121 {
1122 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
1123 data_[i] += other.data_[i];

1126

1149
1155 TensorResult<Tensor<T, N>> operator-(const Tensor<T, N>& other) const {
1156 // Check if shapes match exactly
1157 if (dims_ == other.dims_) {
1158 // Fast path: exact shape match
1159 Tensor<T, N> result(dims_, use_gpu_);
1160 size_t total = total_size();
1161
1162#ifdef USE_GPU
1163 if (use_gpu_ && other.use_gpu_) {
1164 TensorGPU::sub_gpu(data_.get(), other.data_.get(), result.data_.get(), total);
1165 } else
1166#endif
1167 {
1168 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
1169 result.data_[i] = data_[i] - other.data_[i];
1170 }
1171 }
1172
1173 return result;
1174 }
1175
1176 // Try broadcasting
1177 std::string error_msg;
1178 if (!are_broadcastable(dims_, other.dims_, &error_msg)) {
1179 return TensorError::DimensionMismatch;
1180 }
1181
1182 // Determine broadcast shape
1183 TensorIndices<N> broadcast_shape = dims_;
1184 for (size_t i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
1185 broadcast_shape[i] = std::max(dims_[i], other.dims_[i]);
1186 }
1187
1188 Tensor<T, N> result(broadcast_shape, use_gpu_);
1189 size_t total = result.total_size();
1190
1191 // Perform broadcasted subtraction
1192 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
1193 TensorIndices<N> coords;
1194 size_t idx = i;
1195 for (size_t d = N; d > 0; --d) {
1196 coords[d - 1] = idx % broadcast_shape[d - 1];
1197 idx /= broadcast_shape[d - 1];
1198 }
1199
1200 size_t self_idx = 0, other_idx = 0;
1201 size_t self_stride = 1, other_stride = 1;
1202 for (size_t d = N; d > 0; --d) {
1203 size_t dim = d - 1;
1204 size_t self_coord = (dims_[dim] == 1) ? 0 : coords[dim];
1205 size_t other_coord = (other.dims_[dim] == 1) ? 0 : coords[dim];
1206
1207 if (dim + 1 < N) {
1208 self_stride *= dims_[dim + 1];
1209 other_stride *= other.dims_[dim + 1];
1210 }
1211
1212 self_idx += self_coord * self_stride;
1213 other_idx += other_coord * other_stride;
1214 }
1215
1216 result.data_[i] = data_[self_idx] - other.data_[other_idx];
1217 }
1218
1219 return result;
1220 }
1221

1239 }
1240 }
1241
1242 return result;

1297 TensorResult<Tensor<T, N>> operator*(const Tensor<T, N>& other) const {
1298 // Check if shapes match exactly
1299 if (dims_ == other.dims_) {
1300 // Fast path: exact shape match
1301 bool track_grad = requires_grad_ || other.requires_grad_;
1302 Tensor<T, N> result(dims_, use_gpu_, track_grad);
1303 result.is_leaf_ = false;
1304 size_t total = total_size();
1305
1306#ifdef USE_GPU
1307 if (use_gpu_ && other.use_gpu_) {
1308 TensorGPU::mul_gpu(data_.get(), other.data_.get(), result.data_.get(), total);
1309 } else
1310#endif
1311 {
1312 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
1313 result.data_[i] = data_[i] * other.data_[i];
1314 }
1315 }
1316
1317 // Setup backward pass (existing code continues)
1318 if (track_grad) {
1319 Tensor<T, N> self_copy = this->detach();
1320 Tensor<T, N> other_copy = other.detach();
1321 Tensor<T, N>* self_ptr = const_cast<Tensor<T, N>*>(this);
1322 Tensor<T, N>* other_ptr = const_cast<Tensor<T, N>*>(&other);
1323
1324 result.register_backward([self_ptr, other_ptr, self_copy, other_copy](const Tensor<T, N>& grad) {
1325 if (self_ptr->requires_grad_) {
1326 if (!self_ptr->grad_) {
1327 self_ptr->grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(self_ptr->dims_, self_ptr->use_gpu_, false);
1328 self_ptr->grad_->fill(T(0));
1329 }
1330
1331 // Optimized using tensor operations
1332 auto grad_result = grad * other_copy;
1333 auto& grad_contrib = std::get<Tensor<T, N>>(grad_result);
1334
1335 // Accumulate gradients using tensor addition
1336 auto grad_sum_result = *self_ptr->grad_ + grad_contrib;
1337 *self_ptr->grad_ = std::get<Tensor<T, N>>(grad_sum_result);
1338
1339 if (!self_ptr->is_leaf_ && !self_ptr->backward_funcs_.empty()) {
1340 for (auto& func : self_ptr->backward_funcs_) {
1341 func(*self_ptr->grad_);
1342 }
1343 }
1344 }
1345
1346 if (other_ptr->requires_grad_) {
1347 if (!other_ptr->grad_) {
1348 other_ptr->grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(other_ptr->dims_, other_ptr->use_gpu_, false);
1349 other_ptr->grad_->fill(T(0));
1350 }
1351
1352 // Optimized using tensor operations
1353 auto grad_result = grad * self_copy;
1354 auto& grad_contrib = std::get<Tensor<T, N>>(grad_result);
1355
1356 // Accumulate gradients using tensor addition
1357 auto grad_sum_result = *other_ptr->grad_ + grad_contrib;
1358 *other_ptr->grad_ = std::get<Tensor<T, N>>(grad_sum_result);
1359
1360 if (!other_ptr->is_leaf_ && !other_ptr->backward_funcs_.empty()) {
1361 for (auto& func : other_ptr->backward_funcs_) {
1362 func(*other_ptr->grad_);
1363 }
1364 }
1365 }
1366 });
1367 }
1368
1369 return result;
1370 }
1371
1372 // Try broadcasting
1373 std::string error_msg;
1374 if (!are_broadcastable(dims_, other.dims_, &error_msg)) {
1375 return TensorError::DimensionMismatch;
1376 }
1377
1378 // Determine broadcast shape
1379 TensorIndices<N> broadcast_shape = dims_;
1380 for (size_t i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
1381 broadcast_shape[i] = std::max(dims_[i], other.dims_[i]);
1382 }
1383
1384 bool track_grad = requires_grad_ || other.requires_grad_;
1385 Tensor<T, N> result(broadcast_shape, use_gpu_, track_grad);
1386 result.is_leaf_ = false;
1387 size_t total = result.total_size();
1388
1389 // Perform broadcasted multiplication
1390 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
1391 TensorIndices<N> coords;
1392 size_t idx = i;
1393 for (size_t d = N; d > 0; --d) {
1394 coords[d - 1] = idx % broadcast_shape[d - 1];
1395 idx /= broadcast_shape[d - 1];
1396 }
1397
1398 size_t self_idx = 0, other_idx = 0;
1399 size_t self_stride = 1, other_stride = 1;
1400 for (size_t d = N; d > 0; --d) {
1401 size_t dim = d - 1;
1402 size_t self_coord = (dims_[dim] == 1) ? 0 : coords[dim];
1403 size_t other_coord = (other.dims_[dim] == 1) ? 0 : coords[dim];
1404
1405 if (dim + 1 < N) {
1406 self_stride *= dims_[dim + 1];
1407 other_stride *= other.dims_[dim + 1];
1408 }
1409
1410 self_idx += self_coord * self_stride;
1411 other_idx += other_coord * other_stride;
1412 }
1413
1414 result.data_[i] = data_[self_idx] * other.data_[other_idx];
1415 }
1416
1417 return result;
1418 }
1419
1426 Tensor<T, N> operator*(const T& scalar) const {
1427 Tensor<T, N> result(dims_, use_gpu_, requires_grad_);
1428 result.is_leaf_ = false;
1429 size_t total = total_size();
1430

1441

1458 // If self is not a leaf, propagate gradients further
1459 if (!self_ptr->is_leaf_ && !self_ptr->backward_funcs_.empty()) {

1461 func(*self_ptr->grad_);
1462 }
1463 }
1464 }
1465 });
1466 }

1522 TensorResult<Tensor<T, N>> operator/(const Tensor<T, N>& other) const {
1523 // Check if shapes match exactly
1524 if (dims_ == other.dims_) {

1526 Tensor<T, N> result(dims_, use_gpu_);

1532 } else
1533#endif
1534 {
1535 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
1536 result.data_[i] = data_[i] / other.data_[i];
1537 }
1538 }
1539
1540 return result;
1541 }

1552 broadcast_shape[i] = std::max(dims_[i], other.dims_[i]);
1553 }
1554

1556 size_t total = result.total_size();
1557

1559 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
1560 TensorIndices<N> coords;
1561 size_t idx = i;
1562 for (size_t d = N; d > 0; --d) {
1563 coords[d - 1] = idx % broadcast_shape[d - 1];
1564 idx /= broadcast_shape[d - 1];
1565 }
1566

1568 size_t self_stride = 1, other_stride = 1;
1569 for (size_t d = N; d > 0; --d) {
1570 size_t dim = d - 1;
1571 size_t self_coord = (dims_[dim] == 1) ? 0 : coords[dim];
1572 size_t other_coord = (other.dims_[dim] == 1) ? 0 : coords[dim];
1573
1574 if (dim + 1 < N) {
1575 self_stride *= dims_[dim + 1];
1576 other_stride *= other.dims_[dim + 1];

1578

1580 other_idx += other_coord * other_stride;
1581 }

1662 Tensor<T, N> operator-() const {
1663 Tensor<T, N> result(dims_, use_gpu_);
1664 size_t total = total_size();
1665
1666 // Copy data first
1667 std::copy(data_.get(), data_.get() + total, result.data_.get());
1668
1669 // Negate in place using optimized operations
1670#ifdef USE_BLAS
1671 if (!use_gpu_) {
1672 blas_scal(static_cast<int>(total), T(-1), result.data_.get(), 1);
1673 } else
1674#endif
1675 {
1676 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
1677 result.data_[i] = -result.data_[i];
1678 }
1679 }
1680
1681 return result;
1682 }

2046 Tensor<T, N> sigmoid() const {
2047 Tensor<T, N> result(dims_, use_gpu_, requires_grad_);
2048 result.is_leaf_ = false;
2049 size_t total = total_size();
2050
2051#ifdef USE_GPU
2052 if (use_gpu_) {
2053 TensorGPU::sigmoid_gpu(data_.get(), result.data_.get(), total);
2054 } else
2055#endif
2056 {
2057 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
2058 result.data_[i] = T(1) / (T(1) + std::exp(-data_[i]));
2059 }
2060 }
2061
2062 // Setup backward pass
2063 if (requires_grad_) {
2064 Tensor<T, N> output_copy = result.detach();
2065 Tensor<T, N>* self_ptr = const_cast<Tensor<T, N>*>(this);
2066
2067 result.register_backward([self_ptr, output_copy](const Tensor<T, N>& grad) {
2068 // Gradient of sigmoid: d/dx[sigmoid(x)] = sigmoid(x) * (1 - sigmoid(x))
2069 if (self_ptr->requires_grad_) {
2070 if (!self_ptr->grad_) {
2071 self_ptr->grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(self_ptr->dims_, self_ptr->use_gpu_, false);
2072 self_ptr->grad_->fill(T(0));
2073 }
2074
2075 // Optimized using tensor operations
2076 Tensor<T, N> ones(self_ptr->dims_, self_ptr->use_gpu_);
2077 ones.fill(T(1));
2078 auto one_minus_sig_result = ones - output_copy;
2079 auto& one_minus_sig = std::get<Tensor<T, N>>(one_minus_sig_result);
2080 auto sig_prod_result = output_copy * one_minus_sig;
2081 auto& sig_prod = std::get<Tensor<T, N>>(sig_prod_result);
2082 auto grad_result = grad * sig_prod;
2083 auto& grad_contrib = std::get<Tensor<T, N>>(grad_result);
2084
2085 // Accumulate gradients using tensor addition
2086 auto grad_sum_result = *self_ptr->grad_ + grad_contrib;
2087 *self_ptr->grad_ = std::get<Tensor<T, N>>(grad_sum_result);
2088
2089 // If self is not a leaf, propagate gradients further
2090 if (!self_ptr->is_leaf_ && !self_ptr->backward_funcs_.empty()) {
2091 for (auto& func : self_ptr->backward_funcs_) {
2092 func(*self_ptr->grad_);
2093 }
2094 }
2095 }
2096 });
2097 }
2098
2099 return result;
2100 }
2101
2134 Tensor<T, N> relu() const {
2135 Tensor<T, N> result(dims_, use_gpu_, requires_grad_);
2136 result.is_leaf_ = false;
2137 size_t total = total_size();
2138
2139#ifdef USE_GPU
2140 if (use_gpu_) {
2141 TensorGPU::relu_gpu(data_.get(), result.data_.get(), total);
2142 } else
2143#endif
2144 {
2145 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
2146 result.data_[i] = data_[i] > T(0) ? data_[i] : T(0);
2147 }
2148 }
2149
2150 // Setup backward pass
2151 if (requires_grad_) {
2152 Tensor<T, N> input_copy = this->detach();
2153 Tensor<T, N>* self_ptr = const_cast<Tensor<T, N>*>(this);
2154
2155 result.register_backward([self_ptr, input_copy](const Tensor<T, N>& grad) {
2156 // Gradient of ReLU: d/dx[ReLU(x)] = 1 if x > 0, else 0
2157 if (self_ptr->requires_grad_) {
2158 if (!self_ptr->grad_) {
2159 self_ptr->grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(self_ptr->dims_, self_ptr->use_gpu_, false);
2160 self_ptr->grad_->fill(T(0));
2161 }
2162
2163 // Optimized using tensor operations - create mask
2164 Tensor<T, N> zeros(self_ptr->dims_, self_ptr->use_gpu_);
2165 zeros.fill(T(0));
2166 Tensor<T, N> mask = input_copy > zeros;
2167 auto grad_result = grad * mask;
2168 auto& grad_contrib = std::get<Tensor<T, N>>(grad_result);
2169
2170 // Accumulate gradients using tensor addition
2171 auto grad_sum_result = *self_ptr->grad_ + grad_contrib;
2172 *self_ptr->grad_ = std::get<Tensor<T, N>>(grad_sum_result);
2173 }
2174 });
2175 }
2176
2177 return result;
2178 }

2307 template<typename C>
2308 static Tensor<T, N> where(const Tensor<C, N>& condition, const Tensor<T, N>& x, const Tensor<T, N>& y) {
2309 if (condition.dims() != x.dims() || x.dims() != y.dims()) {
2310 throw std::invalid_argument("where(): all tensors must have the same shape");
2311 }
2312
2313 Tensor<T, N> result(x.dims(), x.use_gpu_);
2314 size_t total = x.total_size();
2315
2316 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
2317 result.data_[i] = condition.data()[i] ? x.data_[i] : y.data_[i];
2318 }
2319
2320 return result;
2321 }

2477 if (dims_ != upstream_grad.dims_) {
2478 return TensorError::DimensionMismatch;
2479 }

2482 size_t total = total_size();
2483
2484 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
2485 result.data_[i] = data_[i] * upstream_grad.data_[i];

2516 T sum() const {
2517 T result = T(0);
2518 size_t total = total_size();
2519
2520 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
2521 result += data_[i];

2550 T mean() const {
2551 return sum() / static_cast<T>(total_size());
2552 }
2553
2582 T variance(size_t ddof = 0) const {
2583 T m = mean();
2584 Tensor<T, N> diff = *this - m;
2585 auto squared_result = diff * diff;
2586 auto& squared = std::get<Tensor<T, N>>(squared_result);
2587 T var = squared.sum();
2588 return var / static_cast<T>(total_size() - ddof);
2589 }
2590
2596 T std(size_t ddof = 0) const {
2597 return std::sqrt(variance(ddof));
2598 }
2599
2607 TensorResult<T> covariance(const Tensor<T, N>& other, size_t ddof = 0) const {
2608 if (total_size() != other.total_size()) {
2609 return TensorError::DimensionMismatch;
2610 }
2611
2612 size_t total = total_size();
2613 if (total <= ddof) {
2614 return TensorError::InvalidArgument;
2615 }
2616
2617 T mean1 = mean();
2618 T mean2 = other.mean();
2619
2620 Tensor<T, N> diff1 = *this - mean1;
2621 Tensor<T, N> diff2 = other - mean2;
2622 auto product_result = diff1 * diff2;
2623 auto& product = std::get<Tensor<T, N>>(product_result);
2624 T cov = product.sum();
2625
2626 return cov / static_cast<T>(total - ddof);
2627 }
2628
2635 TensorResult<T> correlation(const Tensor<T, N>& other) const {
2636 if (total_size() != other.total_size()) {
2637 return TensorError::DimensionMismatch;
2638 }
2639
2640 T mean1 = mean();
2641 T mean2 = other.mean();
2642
2643 Tensor<T, N> diff1 = *this - mean1;
2644 Tensor<T, N> diff2 = other - mean2;
2645
2646 auto cov_result = diff1 * diff2;
2647 auto& cov_tensor = std::get<Tensor<T, N>>(cov_result);
2648 T cov = cov_tensor.sum();
2649
2650 auto var1_result = diff1 * diff1;
2651 auto& var1_tensor = std::get<Tensor<T, N>>(var1_result);
2652 T var1 = var1_tensor.sum();
2653
2654 auto var2_result = diff2 * diff2;
2655 auto& var2_tensor = std::get<Tensor<T, N>>(var2_result);
2656 T var2 = var2_tensor.sum();
2657
2658 T denom = std::sqrt(var1 * var2);
2659 if (denom < std::numeric_limits<T>::epsilon()) {
2660 return TensorError::InvalidArgument;
2661 }
2662
2663 return cov / denom;
2664 }
2665
2671 T median() const {
2672 size_t total = total_size();
2673 std::vector<T> sorted_data(data_.get(), data_.get() + total);
2674 std::sort(sorted_data.begin(), sorted_data.end());
2675
2676 if (total % 2 == 0) {
2677 return (sorted_data[total/2 - 1] + sorted_data[total/2]) / T(2);
2678 } else {
2679 return sorted_data[total/2];
2680 }
2681 }
2682
2688 TensorResult<T> quantile(T q) const {
2689 if (q < T(0) || q > T(1)) {
2690 return TensorError::InvalidArgument;
2691 }
2692
2693 size_t total = total_size();
2694 std::vector<T> sorted_data(data_.get(), data_.get() + total);
2695 std::sort(sorted_data.begin(), sorted_data.end());
2696
2697 T pos = q * static_cast<T>(total - 1);
2698 size_t lower = static_cast<size_t>(pos);
2699 size_t upper = lower + 1;
2700
2701 if (upper >= total) {
2702 return sorted_data[total - 1];
2703 }
2704
2705 T frac = pos - static_cast<T>(lower);
2706 return sorted_data[lower] * (T(1) - frac) + sorted_data[upper] * frac;
2707 }

2713 T min() const {
2714 size_t total = total_size();
2715 T min_val = data_[0];
2716 for (size_t i = 1; i < total; ++i) {
2717 if (data_[i] < min_val) {
2718 min_val = data_[i];
2719 }
2720 }
2721 return min_val;
2722 }
2723
2728 T max() const {
2729 size_t total = total_size();
2730 T max_val = data_[0];
2731 for (size_t i = 1; i < total; ++i) {
2732 if (data_[i] > max_val) {
2733 max_val = data_[i];
2734 }
2735 }
2736 return max_val;
2737 }
2738
2744 TensorResult<T> spearman_correlation(const Tensor<T, N>& other) const {
2745 if (total_size() != other.total_size()) {
2746 return TensorError::DimensionMismatch;
2747 }
2748
2749 size_t total = total_size();
2750
2751 // Create rank vectors
2752 std::vector<std::pair<T, size_t>> data1(total);
2753 std::vector<std::pair<T, size_t>> data2(total);
2754
2755 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
2756 data1[i] = {data_[i], i};
2757 data2[i] = {other.data_[i], i};
2758 }
2759
2760 // Sort by value
2761 std::sort(data1.begin(), data1.end());
2762 std::sort(data2.begin(), data2.end());
2763
2764 // Assign ranks
2765 std::vector<T> rank1(total);
2766 std::vector<T> rank2(total);
2767
2768 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
2769 rank1[data1[i].second] = static_cast<T>(i + 1);
2770 rank2[data2[i].second] = static_cast<T>(i + 1);
2771 }
2772
2773 // Compute Pearson correlation on ranks using tensor operations
2774 Tensor<T, 1> rank1_tensor({total}, use_gpu_);
2775 Tensor<T, 1> rank2_tensor({total}, use_gpu_);
2776
2777 std::copy(rank1.begin(), rank1.end(), rank1_tensor.data_ptr());
2778 std::copy(rank2.begin(), rank2.end(), rank2_tensor.data_ptr());
2779
2780 auto diff_result = rank1_tensor - rank2_tensor;
2781 auto& diff_tensor = std::get<Tensor<T, 1>>(diff_result);
2782 auto squared_result = diff_tensor * diff_tensor;
2783 auto& squared_tensor = std::get<Tensor<T, 1>>(squared_result);
2784 T sum_d_squared = squared_tensor.sum();
2785
2786 T n = static_cast<T>(total);
2787 return T(1) - (T(6) * sum_d_squared) / (n * (n * n - T(1)));
2788 }
2789
2795 Tensor<T, N> normalize(size_t ddof = 0) const {
2796 T m = mean();
2797 T s = std(ddof);
2798
2799 if (s < std::numeric_limits<T>::epsilon()) {
2800 // If std is zero, just center the data
2801 return *this - m;
2802 }
2803
2804 return (*this - m) / s;
2805 }
2806
2811 Tensor<T, N> standardize() const {
2812 T min_val = min();
2813 T max_val = max();
2814 T range = max_val - min_val;
2815
2816 if (range < std::numeric_limits<T>::epsilon()) {
2817 // If all values are the same, return zeros
2818 Tensor<T, N> result(dims_, use_gpu_);
2819 result.fill(T(0));
2820 return result;
2821 }
2822
2823 return (*this - min_val) / range;
2824 }

3036
3043 Tensor<T, N> clip(T min_val, T max_val) const {
3044 Tensor<T, N> result(dims_, use_gpu_, requires_grad_);
3045 result.is_leaf_ = false;
3046 size_t total = total_size();
3047
3048 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
3049 result.data_[i] = std::max(min_val, std::min(max_val, data_[i]));
3050 }
3051
3052 // Setup backward pass
3053 if (requires_grad_) {
3054 Tensor<T, N>* self_ptr = const_cast<Tensor<T, N>*>(this);
3055
3056 result.register_backward([self_ptr, min_val, max_val](const Tensor<T, N>& grad) {
3057 if (self_ptr->requires_grad_) {
3058 if (!self_ptr->grad_) {
3059 self_ptr->grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(self_ptr->dims_,
3060 self_ptr->use_gpu_, false);
3061 self_ptr->grad_->fill(T(0));
3062 }
3063
3064 size_t total = self_ptr->total_size();
3065 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
3066 // Gradient passes through only if value is within range
3067 if (self_ptr->data_[i] > min_val && self_ptr->data_[i] < max_val) {
3068 self_ptr->grad_->data_[i] += grad.data_[i];
3069 }
3070 }
3071
3072 if (!self_ptr->is_leaf_ && !self_ptr->backward_funcs_.empty()) {
3073 for (auto& func : self_ptr->backward_funcs_) {
3074 func(*self_ptr->grad_);
3075 }
3076 }
3077 }
3078 });
3079 }
3080
3081 return result;
3082 }
3083
3091 template<typename M>
3092 Tensor<T, N> masked_fill(const Tensor<M, N>& mask, T fill_value) const {
3093 if (dims_ != mask.dims()) {
3094 return *this;
3095 }
3096
3097 Tensor<T, N> result(dims_, use_gpu_);
3098 size_t total = total_size();
3099
3100 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
3101 result.data_[i] = (mask.data()[i] != M(0)) ? fill_value : data_[i];
3102 }
3103
3104 return result;
3105 }
3106
3113 template<typename M>
3114 Tensor<T, 1> masked_select(const Tensor<M, N>& mask) const {
3115 if (dims_ != mask.dims()) {
3116 return Tensor<T, 1>({0}, use_gpu_);
3117 }
3118
3119 // Count how many values to select
3120 size_t total = total_size();
3121 size_t count = 0;
3122 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
3123 if (mask.data()[i] != M(0)) {
3124 count++;
3125 }
3126 }
3127
3128 Tensor<T, 1> result({count}, use_gpu_);
3129 size_t idx = 0;
3130 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
3131 if (mask.data()[i] != M(0)) {
3132 result.data_[idx++] = data_[i];
3133 }
3134 }
3135
3136 return result;
3137 }

3152 template <typename U>
3153 Tensor<U, N> astype() const {
3154 Tensor<U, N> result(dims_, use_gpu_);
3155 size_t total = total_size();
3156
3157 const T* src_data = data_ptr();
3158 U* dst_data = result.data_ptr();
3159
3160 #pragma omp parallel for if(total > 10000)
3161 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
3162 dst_data[i] = static_cast<U>(src_data[i]);
3163 }
3164
3165 return result;
3166 }

3196 void uniform(T low = T(0), T high = T(1)) {
3197 size_t total = total_size();
3198 std::random_device rd;
3199 std::mt19937 gen(rd());
3200 std::uniform_real_distribution<> dis(static_cast<double>(low), static_cast<double>(high));
3201
3202 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
3203 data_[i] = static_cast<T>(dis(gen));
3204 }
3205 }

3211 void bernoulli(T p = T(0.5)) {
3212 size_t total = total_size();
3213 std::random_device rd;
3214 std::mt19937 gen(rd());
3215 std::bernoulli_distribution dis(static_cast<double>(p));
3216
3217 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
3218 data_[i] = dis(gen) ? T(1) : T(0);
3219 }

3228 template<size_t... Dims>
3229 static Tensor<T, N+1> stack(const std::vector<Tensor<T, N>>& tensors, size_t dim = 0) {
3230 if (tensors.empty()) {
3231 return Tensor<T, N+1>({0}, false);
3232 }
3233
3234 if (dim > N) {
3235 return Tensor<T, N+1>({0}, false);
3236 }
3237
3238 // Check all tensors have the same shape
3239 const auto& first_dims = tensors[0].dims_;
3240 for (const auto& t : tensors) {
3241 if (t.dims_ != first_dims) {
3242 return Tensor<T, N+1>({0}, false);
3243 }
3244 }
3245
3246 // Compute new dimensions
3247 TensorIndices<N+1> new_dims;
3248 for (size_t i = 0; i < dim; ++i) {
3249 new_dims[i] = first_dims[i];
3250 }
3251 new_dims[dim] = tensors.size();
3252 for (size_t i = dim; i < N; ++i) {
3253 new_dims[i+1] = first_dims[i];
3254 }
3255
3256 Tensor<T, N+1> result(new_dims, tensors[0].use_gpu_);
3257
3258 // Copy data
3259 size_t slice_size = tensors[0].total_size();
3260 for (size_t t = 0; t < tensors.size(); ++t) {
3261 size_t offset = t * slice_size;
3262 std::copy(tensors[t].data_.get(), tensors[t].data_.get() + slice_size,
3263 result.data_.get() + offset);
3264 }
3265
3266 return result;
3267 }
3268
3274 static Tensor<T, N> vstack(const std::vector<Tensor<T, N>>& tensors) {
3275 static_assert(N >= 2, "vstack requires at least 2D tensors");
3276
3277 if (tensors.empty()) {
3278 TensorIndices<N> zero_dims{};
3279 return Tensor<T, N>(zero_dims, false);
3280 }
3281
3282 if (tensors.size() == 1) {
3283 return Tensor<T, N>(tensors[0]);
3284 }
3285
3286 // Start with first tensor and concatenate the rest
3287 Tensor<T, N> result(tensors[0]);
3288 for (size_t i = 1; i < tensors.size(); ++i) {
3289 result = result.concatenate(tensors[i], 0);
3290 }
3291
3292 return result;
3293 }
3294
3300 static Tensor<T, N> hstack(const std::vector<Tensor<T, N>>& tensors) {
3301 static_assert(N >= 2, "hstack requires at least 2D tensors");
3302
3303 if (tensors.empty()) {
3304 TensorIndices<N> zero_dims{};
3305 return Tensor<T, N>(zero_dims, false);
3306 }
3307
3308 if (tensors.size() == 1) {
3309 return Tensor<T, N>(tensors[0]);
3310 }
3311
3312 // Start with first tensor and concatenate the rest
3313 Tensor<T, N> result(tensors[0]);
3314 for (size_t i = 1; i < tensors.size(); ++i) {
3315 result = result.concatenate(tensors[i], 1);
3316 }
3317
3318 return result;
3319 }

3321 // ============================================
3322 // Loss Functions and Gradients
3323 // ============================================
3324
3330 TensorResult<T> mse_loss(const Tensor<T, N>& target) const {
3331 if (dims_ != target.dims_) {
3332 return TensorError::DimensionMismatch;
3333 }
3334
3335 auto diff_result = *this - target;
3336 auto& diff = std::get<Tensor<T, N>>(diff_result);
3337 auto squared_result = diff * diff;
3338 auto& squared = std::get<Tensor<T, N>>(squared_result);
3339 T loss = squared.sum();
3340
3341 return loss / static_cast<T>(total_size());
3342 }
3343
3350 TensorResult<Tensor<T, N>> mse_loss_gradient(const Tensor<T, N>& target) const {
3351 if (dims_ != target.dims_) {
3352 return TensorError::DimensionMismatch;
3353 }
3354
3355 T scale = T(2) / static_cast<T>(total_size());
3356 auto diff_result = *this - target;
3357 auto& diff = std::get<Tensor<T, N>>(diff_result);
3358 Tensor<T, N> result = diff * scale;
3359
3360 return result;
3361 }
3362
3370 TensorResult<T> binary_crossentropy_loss(const Tensor<T, N>& target, T epsilon = T(1e-7)) const {
3371 if (dims_ != target.dims_) {
3372 return TensorError::DimensionMismatch;
3373 }
3374
3375 T loss = T(0);
3376 size_t total = total_size();
3377
3378 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
3379 T pred = std::max(epsilon, std::min(T(1) - epsilon, data_[i]));
3380 loss += -(target.data_[i] * std::log(pred) +
3381 (T(1) - target.data_[i]) * std::log(T(1) - pred));
3382 }
3383
3384 return loss / static_cast<T>(total);
3385 }
3386
3394 TensorResult<Tensor<T, N>> binary_crossentropy_gradient(const Tensor<T, N>& target,
3395 T epsilon = T(1e-7)) const {
3396 if (dims_ != target.dims_) {
3397 return TensorError::DimensionMismatch;
3398 }
3399
3400 Tensor<T, N> result(dims_, use_gpu_);
3401 size_t total = total_size();
3402 T scale = T(1) / static_cast<T>(total);
3403
3404 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
3405 T pred = std::max(epsilon, std::min(T(1) - epsilon, data_[i]));
3406 result.data_[i] = scale * (-(target.data_[i] / pred) +
3407 ((T(1) - target.data_[i]) / (T(1) - pred)));
3408 }
3409
3410 return result;
3411 }
3412
3420 template<size_t M = N>
3421 typename std::enable_if<M == 1, TensorResult<T>>::type
3422 dot(const Tensor<T, 1>& other) const {
3423 static_assert(N == 1, "This dot product is only for 1D tensors");
3424 if (dims_[0] != other.dims_[0]) {
3425 return TensorError::DimensionMismatch;
3426 }
3427
3428 T result = T();
3429
3430#ifdef USE_GPU
3431 if (use_gpu_ && other.use_gpu_) {
3432 TensorGPU::dot_1d_gpu(data_.get(), other.data_.get(), &result, dims_[0]);
3433 return result;
3434 }
3435#endif
3436
3437#ifdef USE_BLAS
3438 if (!use_gpu_) {
3439 return blas_dot<T>(dims_[0], data_.get(), 1, other.data_.get(), 1);
3440 }
3441#endif
3442
3443 for (size_t i = 0; i < dims_[0]; ++i) {
3444 result += data_[i] * other.data_[i];
3445 }
3446 return result;
3447 }
3448
3456 template<size_t M = N>
3457 typename std::enable_if<M == 2, TensorResult<Tensor<T, 2>>>::type
3458 dot(const Tensor<T, 2>& other) const {
3459 static_assert(N == 2, "This dot product is only for 2D tensors");
3460 if (dims_[1] != other.dims_[0]) {
3461 return TensorError::DimensionMismatch;
3462 }
3463
3464 size_t m = dims_[0];
3465 size_t n = dims_[1];
3466 size_t p = other.dims_[1];
3467
3468 Tensor<T, 2> result({m, p}, use_gpu_);
3469 result.fill(T());
3470
3471#ifdef USE_GPU
3472 if (use_gpu_ && other.use_gpu_) {
3473 TensorGPU::dot_2d_gpu(data_.get(), other.data_.get(), result.data_.get(), m, n, p);
3474 return result;
3475 }
3476#endif
3477
3478#ifdef USE_BLAS
3479 if (!use_gpu_) {
3480 // BLAS gemm: C = alpha * A * B + beta * C
3481 // A is mn, B is np, C is mp
3482 blas_gemm<T>(CblasRowMajor, CblasNoTrans, CblasNoTrans,
3483 m, p, n, T(1), data_.get(), n,
3484 other.data_.get(), p, T(0), result.data_.get(), p);
3485 return result;
3486 }
3487#endif
3488
3489 auto row_range = std::views::iota(size_t(0), m);
3490 std::for_each(std::execution::par, row_range.begin(), row_range.end(),
3491 [&](size_t i) {
3492 for (size_t j = 0; j < p; ++j) {
3493 T sum = T();
3494 for (size_t k = 0; k < n; ++k) {
3495 sum += (*this)[{i, k}] * other[{k, j}];
3496 }
3497 result[{i, j}] = sum;
3498 }
3499 });
3500 return result;
3501 }
3502
3516 template<size_t M = N, size_t P>
3517 typename std::enable_if<(M >= 3), TensorResult<Tensor<T, N + P - 2>>>::type
3518 dot(const Tensor<T, P>& other) const {
3519 static_assert(N >= 3 || P >= 1, "This dot product is for higher dimensional tensors");
3520
3521 // Check that the last dimension of this matches first dimension of other
3522 if (dims_[N - 1] != other.dims_[0]) {
3523 return TensorError::ContractionMismatch;
3524 }
3525
3526 size_t contract_dim = dims_[N - 1];
3527
3528 // Calculate output dimensions: all dims of this except last,
3529 // plus all dims of other except first
3530 TensorIndices<N + P - 2> result_dims;
3531 for (size_t i = 0; i < N - 1; ++i) {
3532 result_dims[i] = dims_[i];
3533 }
3534 for (size_t i = 1; i < P; ++i) {
3535 result_dims[N - 1 + i - 1] = other.dims_[i];
3536 }
3537
3538 Tensor<T, N + P - 2> result(result_dims, use_gpu_);
3539 result.fill(T());
3540
3541 // Calculate strides for output indexing
3542 size_t outer_size = 1; // Product of all dims except last in this tensor
3543 for (size_t i = 0; i < N - 1; ++i) {
3544 outer_size *= dims_[i];
3545 }
3546
3547 size_t inner_size = 1; // Product of all dims except first in other tensor
3548 for (size_t i = 1; i < P; ++i) {
3549 inner_size *= other.dims_[i];
3550 }
3551
3552#ifdef USE_GPU
3553 if (use_gpu_ && other.use_gpu_) {
3554 TensorGPU::dot_nd_gpu(data_.get(), other.data_.get(), result.data_.get(),
3555 outer_size, contract_dim, inner_size);
3556 return result;
3557 }
3558#endif
3559
3560 // Perform contraction with parallel execution
3561 auto outer_range = std::views::iota(size_t(0), outer_size);
3562 std::for_each(std::execution::par, outer_range.begin(), outer_range.end(),
3563 [&](size_t outer) {
3564 for (size_t inner = 0; inner < inner_size; ++inner) {
3565 T sum = T();
3566 for (size_t k = 0; k < contract_dim; ++k) {
3567 // Calculate flat indices for input tensors
3568 size_t idx_this = outer * contract_dim + k;
3569 size_t idx_other = k * inner_size + inner;
3570 sum += data_[idx_this] * other.data_[idx_other];
3571 }
3572 // Calculate flat index for output tensor
3573 size_t idx_result = outer * inner_size + inner;
3574 result.data_[idx_result] = sum;
3575 }
3576 });
3577
3578 return result;
3579 }
3580
3608 template<size_t M = N>
3609 typename std::enable_if<M == 1, TensorResult<Tensor<T, 1>>>::type
3610 cross(const Tensor<T, 1>& other) const {
3611 static_assert(N == 1, "Cross product is only for 1D tensors");
3612 if (dims_[0] != 3) {
3613 return TensorError::DimensionMismatch;
3614 }
3615 if (other.dims_[0] != 3) {
3616 return TensorError::DimensionMismatch;
3617 }
3618
3619 Tensor<T, 1> result({3}, use_gpu_);
3620
3621 // Cross product formula: a b = [a2*b3 - a3*b2, a3*b1 - a1*b3, a1*b2 - a2*b1]
3622 T a1 = data_[0], a2 = data_[1], a3 = data_[2];
3623 T b1 = other.data_[0], b2 = other.data_[1], b3 = other.data_[2];
3624
3625#ifdef USE_GPU
3626 if (use_gpu_ && other.use_gpu_) {
3627 TensorGPU::cross_3d_gpu(data_.get(), other.data_.get(), result.data_.get());
3628 return result;
3629 }
3630#endif
3631
3632 result.data_[0] = a2 * b3 - a3 * b2;
3633 result.data_[1] = a3 * b1 - a1 * b3;
3634 result.data_[2] = a1 * b2 - a2 * b1;
3635
3636 return result;
3637 }
3638
3639 // ============================================
3640 // Phase 1: Core Neural Network Operations
3641 // ============================================
3642
3686 template<size_t M = N>
3687 typename std::enable_if<M == 2, TensorResult<Tensor<T, 2>>>::type
3688 matmul(const Tensor<T, 2>& other) const {
3689 static_assert(N == 2, "matmul requires 2D tensors");
3690
3691 if (dims_[1] != other.dims_[0]) {
3692 return TensorError::DimensionMismatch;
3693 }
3694
3695 size_t m = dims_[0];
3696 size_t n = dims_[1];
3697 size_t p = other.dims_[1];
3698
3699 bool track_grad = requires_grad_ || other.requires_grad_;
3700 Tensor<T, 2> result({m, p}, use_gpu_, track_grad);
3701 result.is_leaf_ = false;
3702 result.fill(T(0));
3703
3704 // Forward pass - use existing optimized dot product
3705#ifdef USE_BLAS
3706 if (!use_gpu_) {
3707 blas_gemm<T>(CblasRowMajor, CblasNoTrans, CblasNoTrans,
3708 m, p, n, T(1), data_.get(), n,
3709 other.data_.get(), p, T(0), result.data_.get(), p);
3710 } else
3711#endif
3712 {
3713 for (size_t i = 0; i < m; ++i) {
3714 for (size_t j = 0; j < p; ++j) {
3715 T sum = T(0);
3716 for (size_t k = 0; k < n; ++k) {
3717 sum += (*this)[{i, k}] * other[{k, j}];
3718 }
3719 result[{i, j}] = sum;
3720 }
3721 }
3722 }
3723
3724 // Setup backward pass for autograd
3725 if (track_grad) {
3726 Tensor<T, 2> self_copy = this->detach();
3727 Tensor<T, 2> other_copy = other.detach();
3728 Tensor<T, 2>* self_ptr = const_cast<Tensor<T, 2>*>(this);
3729 Tensor<T, 2>* other_ptr = const_cast<Tensor<T, 2>*>(&other);
3730
3731 result.register_backward([self_ptr, other_ptr, self_copy, other_copy, m, n, p]
3732 (const Tensor<T, 2>& grad) {
3733 // Gradient for matmul:
3734 // If C = A @ B, then:
3735 // dL/dA = dL/dC @ B^T
3736 // dL/dB = A^T @ dL/dC
3737
3738 if (self_ptr->requires_grad_) {
3739 if (!self_ptr->grad_) {
3740 self_ptr->grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, 2>>(self_ptr->dims_, self_ptr->use_gpu_, false);
3741 self_ptr->grad_->fill(T(0));
3742 }
3743
3744 // dL/dA = grad @ other^T
3745 for (size_t i = 0; i < m; ++i) {
3746 for (size_t k = 0; k < n; ++k) {
3747 T sum = T(0);
3748 for (size_t j = 0; j < p; ++j) {
3749 sum += grad[{i, j}] * other_copy[{k, j}];
3750 }
3751 (*self_ptr->grad_)[{i, k}] += sum;
3752 }
3753 }
3754
3755 // Propagate further if not leaf
3756 if (!self_ptr->is_leaf_ && !self_ptr->backward_funcs_.empty()) {
3757 for (auto& func : self_ptr->backward_funcs_) {
3758 func(*self_ptr->grad_);
3759 }
3760 }
3761 }
3762
3763 if (other_ptr->requires_grad_) {
3764 if (!other_ptr->grad_) {
3765 other_ptr->grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, 2>>(other_ptr->dims_, other_ptr->use_gpu_, false);
3766 other_ptr->grad_->fill(T(0));
3767 }
3768
3769 // dL/dB = self^T @ grad
3770 for (size_t k = 0; k < n; ++k) {
3771 for (size_t j = 0; j < p; ++j) {
3772 T sum = T(0);
3773 for (size_t i = 0; i < m; ++i) {
3774 sum += self_copy[{i, k}] * grad[{i, j}];
3775 }
3776 (*other_ptr->grad_)[{k, j}] += sum;
3777 }
3778 }
3779
3780 // Propagate further if not leaf
3781 if (!other_ptr->is_leaf_ && !other_ptr->backward_funcs_.empty()) {
3782 for (auto& func : other_ptr->backward_funcs_) {
3783 func(*other_ptr->grad_);
3784 }
3785 }
3786 }
3787 });
3788 }
3789
3790 return result;
3791 }
3792
3799 Tensor<T, N> sum_axis(int axis, bool keepdims = false) const {
3800 if (axis < 0) {
3801 axis = static_cast<int>(N) + axis;
3802 }
3803
3804 if (axis < 0 || axis >= static_cast<int>(N)) {
3805 TensorIndices<N> zero_dims{};
3806 return Tensor<T, N>(zero_dims, use_gpu_, requires_grad_);
3807 }
3808
3809 size_t ax = static_cast<size_t>(axis);
3810
3811 // Compute output dimensions
3812 TensorIndices<N> result_dims = dims_;
3813 if (keepdims) {
3814 result_dims[ax] = 1;
3815 } else {
3816 // For now, keep the dimension but set to 1
3817 // A proper implementation would reduce the tensor rank
3818 result_dims[ax] = 1;
3819 }
3820
3821 Tensor<T, N> result(result_dims, use_gpu_, requires_grad_);
3822 result.is_leaf_ = false;
3823 result.fill(T(0));
3824
3825 // Compute sum
3826 size_t outer = 1;
3827 for (size_t i = 0; i < ax; ++i) {
3828 outer *= dims_[i];
3829 }
3830
3831 size_t reduce_dim = dims_[ax];
3832
3833 size_t inner = 1;
3834 for (size_t i = ax + 1; i < N; ++i) {
3835 inner *= dims_[i];
3836 }
3837
3838 for (size_t o = 0; o < outer; ++o) {
3839 for (size_t i = 0; i < inner; ++i) {
3840 T sum = T(0);
3841 for (size_t r = 0; r < reduce_dim; ++r) {
3842 TensorIndices<N> idx;
3843 size_t linear_idx = o * reduce_dim * inner + r * inner + i;
3844
3845 // Convert linear index to multi-dimensional
3846 size_t temp = linear_idx;
3847 for (int d = static_cast<int>(N) - 1; d >= 0; --d) {
3848 idx[d] = temp % dims_[d];
3849 temp /= dims_[d];
3850 }
3851
3852 sum += (*this)[idx];
3853 }
3854
3855 TensorIndices<N> result_idx;
3856 size_t result_linear = o * inner + i;
3857 size_t temp = result_linear;
3858 for (int d = static_cast<int>(N) - 1; d >= 0; --d) {
3859 if (d == static_cast<int>(ax)) {
3860 result_idx[d] = 0;
3861 } else if (d < static_cast<int>(ax)) {
3862 result_idx[d] = temp / inner;
3863 temp %= inner;
3864 } else {
3865 result_idx[d] = temp % result_dims[d];
3866 temp /= result_dims[d];
3867 }
3868 }
3869
3870 result[result_idx] = sum;
3871 }
3872 }
3873
3874 // Setup backward pass
3875 if (requires_grad_) {
3876 Tensor<T, N>* self_ptr = const_cast<Tensor<T, N>*>(this);
3877 TensorIndices<N> self_dims = dims_;
3878 size_t reduce_axis = ax;
3879
3880 result.register_backward([self_ptr, self_dims, reduce_axis](const Tensor<T, N>& grad) {
3881 // Gradient of sum: broadcast gradient back to original shape
3882 if (self_ptr->requires_grad_) {
3883 if (!self_ptr->grad_) {
3884 self_ptr->grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(self_ptr->dims_, self_ptr->use_gpu_, false);
3885 self_ptr->grad_->fill(T(0));
3886 }
3887
3888 // Each element in the original tensor contributed to one element in the sum
3889 // So gradient is just broadcast of the output gradient
3890 size_t total = self_ptr->total_size();
3891 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
3892 TensorIndices<N> idx;
3893 size_t temp = i;
3894 for (int d = static_cast<int>(N) - 1; d >= 0; --d) {
3895 idx[d] = temp % self_dims[d];
3896 temp /= self_dims[d];
3897 }
3898
3899 TensorIndices<N> grad_idx = idx;
3900 grad_idx[reduce_axis] = 0; // Sum reduced this dimension
3901
3902 self_ptr->grad_->data_[i] += grad[grad_idx];
3903 }
3904
3905 if (!self_ptr->is_leaf_ && !self_ptr->backward_funcs_.empty()) {
3906 for (auto& func : self_ptr->backward_funcs_) {
3907 func(*self_ptr->grad_);
3908 }
3909 }
3910 }
3911 });
3912 }
3913
3914 return result;
3915 }
3916
3923 Tensor<T, N> mean_axis(int axis, bool keepdims = false) const {
3924 auto sum_result = sum_axis(axis, keepdims);
3925
3926 if (axis < 0) {
3927 axis = static_cast<int>(N) + axis;
3928 }
3929
3930 T count = static_cast<T>(dims_[axis]);
3931
3932 // Divide by count
3933 Tensor<T, N> result = sum_result * (T(1) / count);
3934
3935 return result;
3936 }
3937
3973 Tensor<T, N> softmax(int axis = -1) const {
3974 if (axis < 0) {
3975 axis = static_cast<int>(N) + axis;
3976 }
3977
3978 if (axis < 0 || axis >= static_cast<int>(N)) {
3979 TensorIndices<N> zero_dims{};
3980 return Tensor<T, N>(zero_dims, use_gpu_, requires_grad_);
3981 }
3982
3983 size_t ax = static_cast<size_t>(axis);
3984
3985 Tensor<T, N> result(dims_, use_gpu_, requires_grad_);
3986 result.is_leaf_ = false;
3987
3988 // Compute softmax with numerical stability (subtract max)
3989 size_t outer = 1;
3990 for (size_t i = 0; i < ax; ++i) {
3991 outer *= dims_[i];
3992 }
3993
3994 size_t softmax_dim = dims_[ax];
3995
3996 size_t inner = 1;
3997 for (size_t i = ax + 1; i < N; ++i) {
3998 inner *= dims_[i];
3999 }
4000
4001 for (size_t o = 0; o < outer; ++o) {
4002 for (size_t i = 0; i < inner; ++i) {
4003 // Find max for numerical stability
4004 T max_val = std::numeric_limits<T>::lowest();
4005 for (size_t s = 0; s < softmax_dim; ++s) {
4006 TensorIndices<N> idx;
4007 size_t linear_idx = o * softmax_dim * inner + s * inner + i;
4008
4009 size_t temp = linear_idx;
4010 for (int d = static_cast<int>(N) - 1; d >= 0; --d) {
4011 idx[d] = temp % dims_[d];
4012 temp /= dims_[d];
4013 }
4014
4015 max_val = std::max(max_val, (*this)[idx]);
4016 }
4017
4018 // Compute exp(x - max) and sum
4019 T sum_exp = T(0);
4020 std::vector<T> exp_vals(softmax_dim);
4021
4022 for (size_t s = 0; s < softmax_dim; ++s) {
4023 TensorIndices<N> idx;
4024 size_t linear_idx = o * softmax_dim * inner + s * inner + i;
4025
4026 size_t temp = linear_idx;
4027 for (int d = static_cast<int>(N) - 1; d >= 0; --d) {
4028 idx[d] = temp % dims_[d];
4029 temp /= dims_[d];
4030 }
4031
4032 exp_vals[s] = std::exp((*this)[idx] - max_val);
4033 sum_exp += exp_vals[s];
4034 }
4035
4036 // Normalize
4037 for (size_t s = 0; s < softmax_dim; ++s) {
4038 TensorIndices<N> idx;
4039 size_t linear_idx = o * softmax_dim * inner + s * inner + i;
4040
4041 size_t temp = linear_idx;
4042 for (int d = static_cast<int>(N) - 1; d >= 0; --d) {
4043 idx[d] = temp % dims_[d];
4044 temp /= dims_[d];
4045 }
4046
4047 result[idx] = exp_vals[s] / sum_exp;
4048 }
4049 }
4050 }
4051
4052 // Setup backward pass
4053 if (requires_grad_) {
4054 Tensor<T, N> output_copy = result.detach();
4055 Tensor<T, N>* self_ptr = const_cast<Tensor<T, N>*>(this);
4056 size_t softmax_axis = ax;
4057 TensorIndices<N> self_dims = dims_;
4058
4059 result.register_backward([self_ptr, output_copy, softmax_axis, self_dims, outer, softmax_dim, inner]
4060 (const Tensor<T, N>& grad) {
4061 // Gradient of softmax:
4062 // dsoftmax_i/dx_j = softmax_i * (_ij - softmax_j)
4063 if (self_ptr->requires_grad_) {
4064 if (!self_ptr->grad_) {
4065 self_ptr->grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(self_ptr->dims_, self_ptr->use_gpu_, false);
4066 self_ptr->grad_->fill(T(0));
4067 }
4068
4069 for (size_t o = 0; o < outer; ++o) {
4070 for (size_t i = 0; i < inner; ++i) {
4071 for (size_t s = 0; s < softmax_dim; ++s) {
4072 TensorIndices<N> idx_s;
4073 size_t linear_s = o * softmax_dim * inner + s * inner + i;
4074
4075 size_t temp = linear_s;
4076 for (int d = static_cast<int>(N) - 1; d >= 0; --d) {
4077 idx_s[d] = temp % self_dims[d];
4078 temp /= self_dims[d];
4079 }
4080
4081 T sum = T(0);
4082 for (size_t j = 0; j < softmax_dim; ++j) {
4083 TensorIndices<N> idx_j = idx_s;
4084 idx_j[softmax_axis] = j;
4085
4086 T delta_ij = (s == j) ? T(1) : T(0);
4087 sum += grad[idx_j] * (delta_ij - output_copy[idx_j]);
4088 }
4089
4090 (*self_ptr->grad_)[idx_s] += output_copy[idx_s] * sum;
4091 }
4092 }
4093 }
4094
4095 if (!self_ptr->is_leaf_ && !self_ptr->backward_funcs_.empty()) {
4096 for (auto& func : self_ptr->backward_funcs_) {
4097 func(*self_ptr->grad_);
4098 }
4099 }
4100 }
4101 });
4102 }
4103
4104 return result;
4105 }
4106
4113 Tensor<T, N> log_softmax(int axis = -1) const {
4114 // More numerically stable than log(softmax(x))
4115 if (axis < 0) {
4116 axis = static_cast<int>(N) + axis;
4117 }
4118
4119 // log_softmax(x) = x - max(x) - log(sum(exp(x - max(x))))
4120 // This avoids computing softmax explicitly
4121
4122 size_t ax = static_cast<size_t>(axis);
4123 Tensor<T, N> result(dims_, use_gpu_, requires_grad_);
4124 result.is_leaf_ = false;
4125
4126 size_t outer = 1;
4127 for (size_t i = 0; i < ax; ++i) {
4128 outer *= dims_[i];
4129 }
4130
4131 size_t softmax_dim = dims_[ax];
4132
4133 size_t inner = 1;
4134 for (size_t i = ax + 1; i < N; ++i) {
4135 inner *= dims_[i];
4136 }
4137
4138 for (size_t o = 0; o < outer; ++o) {
4139 for (size_t i = 0; i < inner; ++i) {
4140 // Find max
4141 T max_val = std::numeric_limits<T>::lowest();
4142 for (size_t s = 0; s < softmax_dim; ++s) {
4143 TensorIndices<N> idx;
4144 size_t linear_idx = o * softmax_dim * inner + s * inner + i;
4145
4146 size_t temp = linear_idx;
4147 for (int d = static_cast<int>(N) - 1; d >= 0; --d) {
4148 idx[d] = temp % dims_[d];
4149 temp /= dims_[d];
4150 }
4151
4152 max_val = std::max(max_val, (*this)[idx]);
4153 }
4154
4155 // Compute log(sum(exp(x - max)))
4156 T log_sum_exp = T(0);
4157 for (size_t s = 0; s < softmax_dim; ++s) {
4158 TensorIndices<N> idx;
4159 size_t linear_idx = o * softmax_dim * inner + s * inner + i;
4160
4161 size_t temp = linear_idx;
4162 for (int d = static_cast<int>(N) - 1; d >= 0; --d) {
4163 idx[d] = temp % dims_[d];
4164 temp /= dims_[d];
4165 }
4166
4167 log_sum_exp += std::exp((*this)[idx] - max_val);
4168 }
4169 log_sum_exp = std::log(log_sum_exp);
4170
4171 // Compute result: x - max - log_sum_exp
4172 for (size_t s = 0; s < softmax_dim; ++s) {
4173 TensorIndices<N> idx;
4174 size_t linear_idx = o * softmax_dim * inner + s * inner + i;
4175
4176 size_t temp = linear_idx;
4177 for (int d = static_cast<int>(N) - 1; d >= 0; --d) {
4178 idx[d] = temp % dims_[d];
4179 temp /= dims_[d];
4180 }
4181
4182 result[idx] = (*this)[idx] - max_val - log_sum_exp;
4183 }
4184 }
4185 }
4186
4187 // Backward pass for log_softmax
4188 if (requires_grad_) {
4189 Tensor<T, N> output_copy = result.detach();
4190 Tensor<T, N>* self_ptr = const_cast<Tensor<T, N>*>(this);
4191
4192 result.register_backward([self_ptr, output_copy](const Tensor<T, N>& grad) {
4193 // d/dx[log_softmax(x)] = 1 - softmax(x) for diagonal
4194 // Gradient: grad_input = grad_output - softmax(x) * sum(grad_output)
4195 if (self_ptr->requires_grad_) {
4196 if (!self_ptr->grad_) {
4197 self_ptr->grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(self_ptr->dims_, self_ptr->use_gpu_, false);
4198 self_ptr->grad_->fill(T(0));
4199 }
4200
4201 // Compute softmax from log_softmax
4202 size_t total = self_ptr->total_size();
4203 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
4204 T softmax_val = std::exp(output_copy.data_[i]);
4205
4206 // Compute sum of gradients (simplified for now)
4207 T grad_sum = grad.data_[i];
4208
4209 self_ptr->grad_->data_[i] += grad.data_[i] - softmax_val * grad_sum;
4210 }
4211
4212 if (!self_ptr->is_leaf_ && !self_ptr->backward_funcs_.empty()) {
4213 for (auto& func : self_ptr->backward_funcs_) {
4214 func(*self_ptr->grad_);
4215 }
4216 }
4217 }
4218 });
4219 }
4220
4221 return result;
4222 }
4223
4224 // ==================== PHASE 3: ADVANCED TENSOR OPERATIONS ====================
4225
4232 template<size_t M>
4233 Tensor<T, M> reshape(const TensorIndices<M>& new_dims) const {
4234 size_t new_total = 1;
4235 for (size_t i = 0; i < M; ++i) {
4236 new_total *= new_dims[i];
4237 }
4238
4239 if (new_total != total_size()) {
4240 TensorIndices<M> zero_dims{};
4241 return Tensor<T, M>(zero_dims, use_gpu_, requires_grad_);
4242 }
4243
4244 Tensor<T, M> result(new_dims, use_gpu_, requires_grad_);
4245 result.is_leaf_ = false;
4246
4247 // Copy data
4248 std::copy(data_.get(), data_.get() + total_size(), result.data_.get());
4249
4250 // Setup backward pass
4251 if (requires_grad_) {
4252 TensorIndices<N> orig_dims = dims_;
4253 Tensor<T, N>* self_ptr = const_cast<Tensor<T, N>*>(this);
4254
4255 result.register_backward([self_ptr, orig_dims](const Tensor<T, M>& grad) {
4256 if (self_ptr->requires_grad_) {
4257 if (!self_ptr->grad_) {
4258 self_ptr->grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(orig_dims,
4259 self_ptr->use_gpu_, false);
4260 self_ptr->grad_->fill(T(0));
4261 }
4262
4263 // Gradient flows back with same reshape
4264 size_t total = self_ptr->total_size();
4265 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
4266 self_ptr->grad_->data_[i] += grad.data_[i];
4267 }
4268
4269 if (!self_ptr->is_leaf_ && !self_ptr->backward_funcs_.empty()) {
4270 for (auto& func : self_ptr->backward_funcs_) {
4271 func(*self_ptr->grad_);
4272 }
4273 }
4274 }
4275 });
4276 }
4277
4278 return result;
4279 }
4280
4286 Tensor<T, N> transpose() const {
4287 static_assert(N >= 2, "Transpose requires at least 2 dimensions");
4288
4289 TensorIndices<N> new_dims = dims_;
4290 std::swap(new_dims[N-2], new_dims[N-1]);
4291
4292 Tensor<T, N> result(new_dims, use_gpu_, requires_grad_);
4293 result.is_leaf_ = false;
4294
4295 // Transpose the last two dimensions
4296 if constexpr (N == 2) {
4297 for (size_t i = 0; i < dims_[0]; ++i) {
4298 for (size_t j = 0; j < dims_[1]; ++j) {
4299 result[{j, i}] = (*this)[{i, j}];
4300 }
4301 }
4302 } else {
4303 // For N>2, transpose last two dims while iterating over others
4304 size_t outer = 1;
4305 for (size_t i = 0; i < N-2; ++i) {
4306 outer *= dims_[i];
4307 }
4308
4309 for (size_t o = 0; o < outer; ++o) {
4310 // Compute indices for outer dimensions
4311 TensorIndices<N> base_idx;
4312 size_t temp = o;
4313 for (int i = N-3; i >= 0; --i) {
4314 base_idx[i] = temp % dims_[i];
4315 temp /= dims_[i];
4316 }
4317
4318 for (size_t i = 0; i < dims_[N-2]; ++i) {
4319 for (size_t j = 0; j < dims_[N-1]; ++j) {
4320 TensorIndices<N> src_idx = base_idx;
4321 TensorIndices<N> dst_idx = base_idx;
4322 src_idx[N-2] = i;
4323 src_idx[N-1] = j;
4324 dst_idx[N-2] = j;
4325 dst_idx[N-1] = i;
4326 result[dst_idx] = (*this)[src_idx];
4327 }
4328 }
4329 }
4330 }
4331
4332 // Setup backward pass
4333 if (requires_grad_) {
4334 Tensor<T, N>* self_ptr = const_cast<Tensor<T, N>*>(this);
4335
4336 result.register_backward([self_ptr](const Tensor<T, N>& grad) {
4337 if (self_ptr->requires_grad_) {
4338 if (!self_ptr->grad_) {
4339 self_ptr->grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(self_ptr->dims_,
4340 self_ptr->use_gpu_, false);
4341 self_ptr->grad_->fill(T(0));
4342 }
4343
4344 // Gradient of transpose is transpose of gradient
4345 Tensor<T, N> grad_transposed = grad.transpose();
4346 size_t total = self_ptr->total_size();
4347 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
4348 self_ptr->grad_->data_[i] += grad_transposed.data_[i];
4349 }
4350
4351 if (!self_ptr->is_leaf_ && !self_ptr->backward_funcs_.empty()) {
4352 for (auto& func : self_ptr->backward_funcs_) {
4353 func(*self_ptr->grad_);
4354 }
4355 }
4356 }
4357 });
4358 }
4359
4360 return result;
4361 }
4362
4368 Tensor<T, N> permute(const TensorIndices<N>& axes) const {
4369 // Validate that axes is a permutation
4370 std::array<bool, N> seen = {false};
4371 for (size_t i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
4372 if (axes[i] >= N || seen[axes[i]]) {
4373 TensorIndices<N> zero_dims{};
4374 return Tensor<T, N>(zero_dims, use_gpu_, requires_grad_);
4375 }
4376 seen[axes[i]] = true;
4377 }
4378
4379 // Compute new dimensions
4380 TensorIndices<N> new_dims;
4381 for (size_t i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
4382 new_dims[i] = dims_[axes[i]];
4383 }
4384
4385 Tensor<T, N> result(new_dims, use_gpu_, requires_grad_);
4386 result.is_leaf_ = false;
4387
4388 // Permute data
4389 size_t total = total_size();
4390 for (size_t idx = 0; idx < total; ++idx) {
4391 // Convert linear index to multi-dimensional indices
4392 TensorIndices<N> src_idx;
4393 size_t temp = idx;
4394 for (int i = N-1; i >= 0; --i) {
4395 src_idx[i] = temp % dims_[i];
4396 temp /= dims_[i];
4397 }
4398
4399 // Permute indices
4400 TensorIndices<N> dst_idx;
4401 for (size_t i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
4402 dst_idx[i] = src_idx[axes[i]];
4403 }
4404
4405 result[dst_idx] = (*this)[src_idx];
4406 }
4407
4408 // Setup backward pass
4409 if (requires_grad_) {
4410 TensorIndices<N> inv_axes;
4411 for (size_t i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
4412 inv_axes[axes[i]] = i;
4413 }
4414
4415 Tensor<T, N>* self_ptr = const_cast<Tensor<T, N>*>(this);
4416
4417 result.register_backward([self_ptr, inv_axes](const Tensor<T, N>& grad) {
4418 if (self_ptr->requires_grad_) {
4419 if (!self_ptr->grad_) {
4420 self_ptr->grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(self_ptr->dims_,
4421 self_ptr->use_gpu_, false);
4422 self_ptr->grad_->fill(T(0));
4423 }
4424
4425 // Gradient flows back with inverse permutation
4426 Tensor<T, N> grad_permuted = grad.permute(inv_axes);
4427 size_t total = self_ptr->total_size();
4428 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
4429 self_ptr->grad_->data_[i] += grad_permuted.data_[i];
4430 }
4431
4432 if (!self_ptr->is_leaf_ && !self_ptr->backward_funcs_.empty()) {
4433 for (auto& func : self_ptr->backward_funcs_) {
4434 func(*self_ptr->grad_);
4435 }
4436 }
4437 }
4438 });
4439 }
4440
4441 return result;
4442 }
4443
4449 Tensor<T, N> squeeze(int axis = -1) const {
4450 if (axis >= 0) {
4451 if (static_cast<size_t>(axis) >= N) {
4452 TensorIndices<N> zero_dims{};
4453 return Tensor<T, N>(zero_dims, use_gpu_, requires_grad_);
4454 }
4455 if (dims_[axis] != 1) {
4456 TensorIndices<N> zero_dims{};
4457 return Tensor<T, N>(zero_dims, use_gpu_, requires_grad_);
4458 }
4459 }
4460
4461 // For simplicity, return a copy with same dimensions
4462 // A proper implementation would change rank
4463 Tensor<T, N> result(dims_, use_gpu_, requires_grad_);
4464 result.is_leaf_ = false;
4465
4466 std::copy(data_.get(), data_.get() + total_size(), result.data_.get());
4467
4468 if (requires_grad_) {
4469 Tensor<T, N>* self_ptr = const_cast<Tensor<T, N>*>(this);
4470
4471 result.register_backward([self_ptr](const Tensor<T, N>& grad) {
4472 if (self_ptr->requires_grad_) {
4473 if (!self_ptr->grad_) {
4474 self_ptr->grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(self_ptr->dims_,
4475 self_ptr->use_gpu_, false);
4476 self_ptr->grad_->fill(T(0));
4477 }
4478
4479 size_t total = self_ptr->total_size();
4480 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
4481 self_ptr->grad_->data_[i] += grad.data_[i];
4482 }
4483
4484 if (!self_ptr->is_leaf_ && !self_ptr->backward_funcs_.empty()) {
4485 for (auto& func : self_ptr->backward_funcs_) {
4486 func(*self_ptr->grad_);
4487 }
4488 }
4489 }
4490 });
4491 }
4492
4493 return result;
4494 }

4501 template<size_t M = N + 1>
4502 Tensor<T, M> unsqueeze(size_t axis) const {
4503 if (axis > N) {
4504 TensorIndices<M> zero_dims{};
4505 return Tensor<T, M>(zero_dims, use_gpu_, requires_grad_);
4506 }
4507
4508 TensorIndices<M> new_dims;
4509 for (size_t i = 0; i < axis; ++i) {
4510 new_dims[i] = dims_[i];
4511 }
4512 new_dims[axis] = 1;
4513 for (size_t i = axis; i < N; ++i) {
4514 new_dims[i+1] = dims_[i];
4515 }
4516
4517 Tensor<T, M> result(new_dims, use_gpu_, requires_grad_);
4518 result.is_leaf_ = false;
4519
4520 std::copy(data_.get(), data_.get() + total_size(), result.data_.get());
4521
4522 if (requires_grad_) {
4523 TensorIndices<N> orig_dims = dims_;
4524 Tensor<T, N>* self_ptr = const_cast<Tensor<T, N>*>(this);
4525
4526 result.register_backward([self_ptr, orig_dims](const Tensor<T, M>& grad) {
4527 if (self_ptr->requires_grad_) {
4528 if (!self_ptr->grad_) {
4529 self_ptr->grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(orig_dims,
4530 self_ptr->use_gpu_, false);
4531 self_ptr->grad_->fill(T(0));
4532 }
4533
4534 size_t total = self_ptr->total_size();
4535 for (size_t i = 0; i < total; ++i) {
4536 self_ptr->grad_->data_[i] += grad.data_[i];
4537 }
4538
4539 if (!self_ptr->is_leaf_ && !self_ptr->backward_funcs_.empty()) {
4540 for (auto& func : self_ptr->backward_funcs_) {
4541 func(*self_ptr->grad_);
4542 }
4543 }
4544 }
4545 });
4546 }
4547
4548 return result;
4549 }
4550
4557 Tensor<T, N> concatenate(const Tensor<T, N>& other, size_t axis) const {
4558 if (axis >= N) {
4559 TensorIndices<N> zero_dims{};
4560 return Tensor<T, N>(zero_dims, use_gpu_, requires_grad_);
4561 }
4562
4563 // Check that all dimensions match except the concat axis
4564 for (size_t i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
4565 if (i != axis && dims_[i] != other.dims_[i]) {
4566 TensorIndices<N> zero_dims{};
4567 return Tensor<T, N>(zero_dims, use_gpu_, requires_grad_);
4568 }
4569 }
4570
4571 TensorIndices<N> new_dims = dims_;
4572 new_dims[axis] = dims_[axis] + other.dims_[axis];
4573
4574 bool track_grad = requires_grad_ || other.requires_grad_;
4575 Tensor<T, N> result(new_dims, use_gpu_, track_grad);
4576 result.is_leaf_ = false;
4577
4578 // Copy data from first tensor
4579 size_t outer = 1;
4580 for (size_t i = 0; i < axis; ++i) {
4581 outer *= dims_[i];
4582 }
4583
4584 size_t inner = 1;
4585 for (size_t i = axis + 1; i < N; ++i) {
4586 inner *= dims_[i];
4587 }
4588
4589 size_t this_axis_size = dims_[axis];
4590 size_t other_axis_size = other.dims_[axis];
4591
4592 for (size_t o = 0; o < outer; ++o) {
4593 // Copy from first tensor
4594 for (size_t a = 0; a < this_axis_size; ++a) {
4595 for (size_t i = 0; i < inner; ++i) {
4596 size_t src_idx = o * this_axis_size * inner + a * inner + i;
4597 size_t dst_idx = o * (this_axis_size + other_axis_size) * inner + a * inner + i;
4598 result.data_[dst_idx] = data_[src_idx];
4599 }
4600 }
4601
4602 // Copy from second tensor
4603 for (size_t a = 0; a < other_axis_size; ++a) {
4604 for (size_t i = 0; i < inner; ++i) {
4605 size_t src_idx = o * other_axis_size * inner + a * inner + i;
4606 size_t dst_idx = o * (this_axis_size + other_axis_size) * inner +
4607 (this_axis_size + a) * inner + i;
4608 result.data_[dst_idx] = other.data_[src_idx];
4609 }
4610 }
4611 }
4612
4613 // Setup backward pass
4614 if (track_grad) {
4615 Tensor<T, N>* self_ptr = const_cast<Tensor<T, N>*>(this);
4616 Tensor<T, N>* other_ptr = const_cast<Tensor<T, N>*>(&other);
4617
4618 result.register_backward([self_ptr, other_ptr, axis, outer, inner,
4619 this_axis_size, other_axis_size](const Tensor<T, N>& grad) {
4620 // Split gradient back to both tensors
4621 if (self_ptr->requires_grad_) {
4622 if (!self_ptr->grad_) {
4623 self_ptr->grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(self_ptr->dims_,
4624 self_ptr->use_gpu_, false);
4625 self_ptr->grad_->fill(T(0));
4626 }
4627
4628 for (size_t o = 0; o < outer; ++o) {
4629 for (size_t a = 0; a < this_axis_size; ++a) {
4630 for (size_t i = 0; i < inner; ++i) {
4631 size_t dst_idx = o * this_axis_size * inner + a * inner + i;
4632 size_t src_idx = o * (this_axis_size + other_axis_size) * inner + a * inner + i;
4633 self_ptr->grad_->data_[dst_idx] += grad.data_[src_idx];
4634 }
4635 }
4636 }
4637
4638 if (!self_ptr->is_leaf_ && !self_ptr->backward_funcs_.empty()) {
4639 for (auto& func : self_ptr->backward_funcs_) {
4640 func(*self_ptr->grad_);
4641 }
4642 }
4643 }
4644
4645 if (other_ptr->requires_grad_) {
4646 if (!other_ptr->grad_) {
4647 other_ptr->grad_ = std::make_unique<Tensor<T, N>>(other_ptr->dims_,
4648 other_ptr->use_gpu_, false);
4649 other_ptr->grad_->fill(T(0));
4650 }
4651
4652 for (size_t o = 0; o < outer; ++o) {
4653 for (size_t a = 0; a < other_axis_size; ++a) {
4654 for (size_t i = 0; i < inner; ++i) {
4655 size_t dst_idx = o * other_axis_size * inner + a * inner + i;
4656 size_t src_idx = o * (this_axis_size + other_axis_size) * inner +
4657 (this_axis_size + a) * inner + i;
4658 other_ptr->grad_->data_[dst_idx] += grad.data_[src_idx];
4659 }
4660 }
4661 }
4662
4663 if (!other_ptr->is_leaf_ && !other_ptr->backward_funcs_.empty()) {
4664 for (auto& func : other_ptr->backward_funcs_) {
4665 func(*other_ptr->grad_);
4666 }
4667 }
4668 }
4669 });
4670 }
4671
4672 return result;
4673 }

4685 Tensor<T, 1> take(const std::vector<size_t>& indices) const {
4686 Tensor<T, 1> result({indices.size()}, use_gpu_);
4687 size_t total = total_size();
4688
4689 for (size_t i = 0; i < indices.size(); ++i) {
4690 if (indices[i] < total) {
4691 result.data_[i] = data_[indices[i]];
4692 } else {
4693 result.data_[i] = T(0); // Out of bounds returns zero
4694 }
4695 }
4696
4697 return result;
4698 }

4706 void put(const std::vector<size_t>& indices, const std::vector<T>& values) {
4707 size_t count = std::min(indices.size(), values.size());
4708 size_t total = total_size();
4709
4710 for (size_t i = 0; i < count; ++i) {
4711 if (indices[i] < total) {
4712 data_[indices[i]] = values[i];
4713 }
4714 }

4726
4735 template<size_t M = (N > 1 ? N - 1 : 1)>
4736 std::enable_if_t<(N > 1), Tensor<T, M>> select(size_t dim, size_t index) const {
4737 if (dim >= N || index >= dims_[dim]) {
4738 TensorIndices<M> zero_dims{};
4739 return Tensor<T, M>(zero_dims, use_gpu_);
4740 }
4741
4742 // Calculate new dimensions (removing the selected dimension)
4743 TensorIndices<M> new_dims;
4744 size_t new_idx = 0;
4745 for (size_t i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
4746 if (i != dim) {
4747 new_dims[new_idx++] = dims_[i];
4748 }
4749 }
4750
4751 Tensor<T, M> result(new_dims, use_gpu_);
4752
4753 // Copy selected slice
4754 size_t result_total = result.total_size();
4755 size_t stride = strides_[dim];
4756 size_t dim_size = dims_[dim];
4757
4758 // Calculate outer and inner sizes
4759 size_t outer = 1;
4760 for (size_t i = 0; i < dim; ++i) {
4761 outer *= dims_[i];
4762 }
4763
4764 size_t inner = 1;
4765 for (size_t i = dim + 1; i < N; ++i) {
4766 inner *= dims_[i];
4767 }
4768
4769 for (size_t o = 0; o < outer; ++o) {
4770 for (size_t i = 0; i < inner; ++i) {
4771 size_t src_idx = o * dim_size * inner + index * inner + i;
4772 size_t dst_idx = o * inner + i;
4773 result.data_[dst_idx] = data_[src_idx];
4774 }
4775 }
4776
4777 return result;
4778 }
